name.title: Name
name.description: Name identifying this item or group.

type.title: Item type
type.description: Code designating the kind of data source. Cannot be changed in this editor.

description.title: Description
description.description: Free text description of the layer, appearing in the datasource description box, overriding any retrieved metadata.

url.title: URL
url.description: Source of the data to load

info.description:
Gets or sets the array of section titles and contents for display in the layer info panel.
        In future this may replace 'description' above - this list should not contain
        sections named 'description' or 'Description' if the 'description' property
        is also set as both will be displayed.
        Content will be rendered as Markdown with HTML.

isPromoted.description: Whether this item is kept above other non-promoted items.
